short_summary: The Department of National Defence is acquiring office furniture to enhance workspaces. The requirement includes delivering, installing and testing the workspaces to meet the Defence standards. The procurement category is Goods, which falls under the jurisdiction of a non-departmental Public Works and Government Services Canada. The expected delivery dates for 75% of the workspaces is between April 15, 2023, and May 31, 2023, with completion ready for users by July 31, 2023.
description: The acquisition of Workspaces Category 1, 2 and 5, comprising delivery, installation and testing of the contract. The objective of the acquisition is to enhance workspaces to meet the Defence standards through office furniture. The Department of National Defence (DND) is ACQUISITION OF WORKSPACES Category 1,2,5 acquisition of office furniture upgrade Montr\u2019al Qu\u00e9bec CANADA MDN
